definition: grass radical 草字頭兒|草字头儿[cao3 zi4 tou2 r5]

sentences.english: Sepals oblong or linear, erect or spreading, base of lateral pair saccate .
sentences.chinese: 萼片長圓形或線形，直立或開展，基於側配對。

sentences.english: Calyx lobes 3, wider than long, margin distinctly dentate.
sentences.chinese: 萼裂片3，長不及寬，邊緣明顯具牙齒。

sentences.english: Margin of leaf blades and calyx lobes ciliate.
sentences.chinese: 葉片和萼裂片的邊緣具緣毛。

sentences.english: Calyx lobes broadly ovate to suborbicular.
sentences.chinese: 萼裂片寬卵形到近圓形。

sentences.english: Sepals oblong, erect, glabrous or pubescent, base of lateral pair not saccate .
sentences.chinese: 萼片長圓形，直立，無毛或被短柔毛，基部側對不。

sentences.english: There is a folk concert tomorrow evening.
sentences.chinese: 明晚將有萼繡民族音樂會。

definition: capital of the Jin State during the Spring and Autumn Period (770-475 BC)
Nichang, abbr. for the Tang Dynasty song "Raiment of Rainbows and Feathers" 霓裳羽衣曲[Ni2 chang2 yu3 yi1 qu1] or 霓裳羽衣舞[Ni2 chang2 yu3 yi1 wu3]
nichang, rainbow colored clothes worn by the Eight Immortals 八仙[Ba1 xian1]
(literary) (of a woman) to have a graceful demeanor/beautiful woman
